kpi.name: M8009C13

kpi_info.title: Intra eNB HO drops due to other failure
kpi_info.use: The number of Intra-eNB Handover drops due to other failures. UPDATED: The counter is updated when an Intra-eNB handover is dropped because of other failure. The counter is updated if the failure detected does not match any other failure counter. Updated to the source cell.

kpi.kpi_alias: Intra eNB HO drops due to other failure
